articles.author: Hugh Son
articles.title: Federal Reserve says all 31 banks in annual stress test withstood a severe hypothetical downturn - CNBC
articles.description: This year's stress test included JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs, credit card companies including American Express and regional lenders such as Truist.
articles.content: The Federal Reserve said Wednesday that the biggest banks operating in the U.S. would be able to withstand a severe recession scenario while maintaining their ability to lend to consumers and corpora… [+2486 chars]
